ServiceRequest.Name: ServiceRequest
ServiceRequest.Description: An instance of the R4 ServiceRequest resource.

authoredOn.Name: authoredOn
authoredOn.Description: The date and time when the ServiceRequest was created.

category.Name: category
category.Description: The FHIR codeable concept: hardcoded to Snomed code - SCTID: 307835004: Referral by service.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: The FHIR intent code (RequestIntent). Hardcoded to “plan”.

priority.Name: priority
priority.Description: The FHIR priority code (RequestPriority). Hardcoded to “routine”.

requester.Name: requester
requester.Description: Reference to a practitioner resource. Returns only one requestor.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The status of the request. Supported values include:

  • active
  • completed
  • revoked

supportingInfo.Name: supportingInfo
supportingInfo.Description:
Information about the ServiceRequest. Can contain a reference to a DocumentReference resource that justifies the request. This links to a .PDF document that can be retrieved on demand.

Note: There can be 0 to many of such DocumentReferences. It is up to the referrer to either send a single collated PDF document, or send multiple PDF documents. Is it also up to the referrer in how often they might send new/updated documentation to each new or ongoing ServiceRequest.
